Sasori uses his [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|Third Kazekage]] [[human puppet]] to manipulate a large quantity of [[Iron Sand]] into a pyramid-shaped figure that lengthens towards his opponent while spinning from left to right.

== Trivia ==
* In the anime, Sasori performs a similar method, where he creates a similar shaped figure but has it spin in a single direction and merely uses it to try and drill it into the target.
